entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.7
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.8
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: support files in the chat (#5940) @anasbarg

üß© Pieces

  • fix: callable flow stuck in running in testing mode (#5948) @abuaboud
  • fix(wedof-pieces): fixing file sending & certification forlder updating methodes (#5942) @obenazouz-wedof
  • feat(slack): update slack custom channel id info (#5926) @geekyme
  • fix: facebook pages markdown rendering (#5923) @arunans23

üêû Bug Fixes

  • feat: support proxy binary data (#5947) @anasbarg
  • fix: add validation for items in the "Loop on Items" piece (#5938) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(git-sync): validate connection (#5939) @abuaboud
  • fix: importing a shared template wasn't working (#5936) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add owner for the connection (#5944) @abuaboud
  • feat: chat and form testing experience (#5841) @anasbarg
  • feat: fast replace for step / trigger (#5933) @abuaboud
  • feat: enable pinned on admin platform (#5930) @abuaboud
  • feat: the ability to export the flow template (#5931) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add ai sdk (#5937) @abuaboud

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • feat: add flow control & universal ai (#5932) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @anasbarg, @arunans23, @geekyme, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @obenazouz-wedof

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.9
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(ai-utility): check moderation, extract structured data and classify text actions (#5934) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: user migration (#5956) @abuaboud

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore(deps): bump langchain from 0.0.156 to 0.2.19 (#5953) @dependabot
  • chore: remove skipValueChangeDetection (#5766) @abuaboud
  • chore: upgrade npm to 9.6.6 (#5951) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@abuaboud, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.10
entry.content:
• fix(bulk-action): resolve issue with selecting multiple rows across different pages in tables for connections, flows, and runs (#5967) @hazemadelkhalel
  • chore:Security upgrade langchain from 0.2.19 to 0.3.3 (#5965) @abuaboud
  • feat: support bulk actions in table (#5945) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • fix: pdf failed to delete folder (#5969) @abuaboud
  • fix(facebook-leads): disable pages dropdown if no pages are found (#5962) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: applying tags to pieces in platform admin (#5976) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(connections): set owner id to null when deleted (#5966) @abuaboud
  • fix(facebook-leads): disable pages dropdown if no pages are found (#5962) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: piece selector doesn't show pinned (#5959) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: Update overview.mdx to remove additional : (#5958) @alitnk

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @alitnk, @hazemadelkhalel and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.11
entry.content:
*feat: allow editing external ids for users in Platform Admin.

üß© Pieces

  • chore(Google Drive): list all files in the folder even if they are > 100 (#5994) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: convert pdf to image too many files error (#5979) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs(properties): added markdown variant options (#5996) @hazemadelkhalel
  • docs: Add pikapods.com hosting option (#5970) @m3nu

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel and @m3nu
